meanings.definition: Echidnas: small, spiny mammals native to Australia and New Guinea
meanings.sent1: Echidnas are unique animals with spiky coats.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of echidnas waddling through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The echidnas had a meeting to discuss their favorite insects.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as prickly as a group of echidnas.
meanings.sent5: The echidnas' spines glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Echidnas: plural form of echidna, referring to more than one individual
meanings.sent1: Look at all the echidnas scurrying around the field!
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper fed the echidnas their favorite treats.
meanings.sent3: The echidnas threw a party to celebrate their new burrow.
meanings.sent4: The echidnas in the garden seemed to dance in unison.
meanings.sent5: A group of echidnas is called a parade.

meanings.definition: Echidnas: belonging to the family Tachyglossidae, characterized by their long snouts and sharp spines
meanings.sent1: The echidnas family is known for their unique features.
meanings.sent2: The echidnas habitat provides them with ample food sources.
meanings.sent3: The echidnas community organized a spiky fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her wit was as sharp as an echidnas quill.
meanings.sent5: The echidnas-like spikes on the fence were a deterrent to intruders.
